Control Name: 5.2.8 Ensure that Activity Log Alert exists for Create or Update or Delete SQL Server Firewall Rule (Scored)
Control Statement: Monitoring for Create or Update or Delete SQL Server Firewall Rule events gives insight into network access changes and may reduce the time it takes to detect suspicious activity.
